Introduction

Kim Kyunyeon is a South Korean guitarist, songwriter, producer and co-founder of the agency ADE Music. He is the guitarist of the indie duo, The ADE, that formed in July 2016.

Before this, he was the guitarist of the duo Acoustic Collabo from June 2014 to June 2016. He also debuted as a soloist on October 3, 2021, with the digital song “Fresh Air”.
